titles: Suspiria, or Sighs on the death of the late most illustrious monarch Charles the II. King of Great Britain, France and Ireland, &c. who changed his earthly for a heavenly crown, on Friday the 6th. February, 168⁴/₅. In the 37th year of His reign, and 55th of his age.
publisher: Re-printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to his most sacred Majesty,
notes: Text in double columns within heavy black mourning border
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
keywords: Charles --  II, --  King of England, 1630-1685 --  Death and burial --  Poetry.
